name: Splat and Blot versus the Alien Cracker
name_original: Splat and Blot versus the Alien Cracker
description:
Splat and Blot versus the Alien Cracker is an action game developed by MaxTaylerMedia. It was originally released in 2021.
Splat and Blot versus the Alien Cracker is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
